title: Gasshin Sentai Mechander Robo (Combining Squadron Mechander Robo)
synopsis: The Doron Empire from the Ganymede System discovered Earth as an ideal world for them to conquer.  The interest of expanding the empire came as a result of the power-hungry General Ozmel who overthrew the current reigning Queen Medusa of the Ganymede System as a start of their universal conquest.
staff: [['Nitta, Yoshikata', ['Director']], ['Mizuki, Ichirou', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Watanabe, Chuumei', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Arrangement', ' Music']], ['Columbia Yurikago Kai', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
